org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.cli
Class CommandLI

java.lang.Object
  org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.Transformer
      org.patrodyne.etl.transformio.cli.CommandLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class CommandLI
extends Transformer
implements UserInterface

Command Line Interface for TransformIO. This class provides methods to start a Batch job and show text the console.

Author:
Rick O'Sullivan

log

protected org.slf4j.Logger log()
Implementation of abstract method from Transformer.

Specified by:
log in class Transformer
Returns:
the logger

start

public static void start(Properties options)

Starts the command line user interface. Unmarshals a batch file to a Batch instance then invokes #execute(Batch) to perform an extract, transform and load operation.

Exceptions are trapped and handled by Transformer.notification(Exception).

Parameters:
options - A dictionary of command line arguments.

showOptions

public static void showOptions(Properties options)

Print the options for this application. Options are echoed to confirm the invocation plan.

Parameters:
options - A dictionary of command line arguments.
See Also:
show(Object)

showUsage

public static void showUsage()

Show the usage for this program. Provides a brief explanation of the command line interface.

See Also:
show(String)

show

public static void show(Object obj)

Show an object to the console. Converts an object to its standard string representation an invokes show(String).

Null objects are ignored.

Parameters:
obj - The object to show.

show

public static void show()
Show empty text. This usually results with a blank line.

show

public static void show(String text)

Show text to the console. Uses log to output a message at the INFO level. Typically, the logger is configured to send informational messages to the console but may be configured to append messages to a log file for scheduled jobs.

Parameters:
text - The string to output.
